Mostwatched.title: Iron Man(2008)
Mostwatched.description:
The Beko BFFD3577 Integrated Tall Freezer has a 220-litre capacity that's ideal for larger households.
It also features six clear storage drawers that make it easy to organise your shopping. The two storage shelves give you even more space to store your family favourites.Fast FreezeNeed to quickly freeze your groceries? Select the fast freeze setting. It quickly freezes fresh food, preserving its taste and nutrients. Perfect for when you've just got back from the supermarket.
Frost Free
No need to manually defrost the freezer thanks to the BFFD3577's Frost Free technology. This handy feature prevents ice build-up, saving you time and effort while freeing-up more storage space.

Mostwatched.title: Marvel’s The First Avengers (2012)
Mostwatched.description:
The Beko BFFD3577 Integrated Tall Freezer has a 220-litre capacity that's ideal for larger households.

Mostwatched.title: Iron Man 2(2010)
Mostwatched.description:
Chiller compartment

Get more room for your weekly shop with the Beko BLSD3577 Integrated Tall Fridge. It offers 309 litres of storage space across 6 shelves, 5 door balconies and a large salad crisper.

The integrated chiller compartment stores your meat, fish and dairy products at a temperature of around 0 °C - ideal for keeping them fresh for longer.

Chrome wine rack

Want extra shelf space? You can easily store soft drinks or bottles of wine on the wire rack.

Reversible doors

For those with smaller kitchens, reversible doors give you the flexibility to choose where you position the fridge.

Easy to monitor

Adjust the temperature easily with the touch controls. Try Quick Cool to rapidly lower the temperature or Holiday Mode if you're going away for a while.

The fridge will alert you when the door is left open, so you can rest assured that your groceries will stay fresh and chilled.

Allmovie.title: Iron Man(2008)
Allmovie.description: Billionaire genius Tony Stark is captured by terrorists and forced to build a weapon, but instead, he creates a high-tech armored suit to escape. After returning home, he perfects the suit and becomes Iron Man, using his technology to fight evil. However, he soon discovers a betrayal within his own company, leading to a battle against his former mentor, Obadiah Stane, who has created a powerful armored suit of his own. With courage and innovation, Tony defeats Stane and publicly declares, 'I am Iron Man.'

Allmovie.title: The Incredible Hulk (2008)
Allmovie.description: Scientist Bruce Banner goes into hiding after a failed experiment with gamma radiation transforms him into the uncontrollable Hulk. While searching for a cure, he is pursued by the U.S. military, led by General Ross, who wants to weaponize his power. Meanwhile, soldier Emil Blonsky undergoes a dangerous transformation, becoming the monstrous Abomination. In a destructive battle, Hulk defeats Abomination and escapes. Bruce continues to struggle with controlling his powers, hinting at his eventual acceptance of the Hulk as part of himself

Allmovie.title: Iron Man 2(2010)
Allmovie.description: With the world aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark faces pressure from the government to share his technology while battling the effects of the arc reactor poisoning his body. Meanwhile, Russian inventor Ivan Vanko, seeking revenge for his father's disgrace, creates his own powerful weapons and becomes Whiplash. As Tony struggles with his mortality and his strained relationship with Pepper Potts, he teams up with James 'Rhodey' Rhodes, who dons the War Machine armor. With help from S.H.I.E.L.D. and new ally Black Widow, Tony overcomes his personal and external battles, defeating Vanko and securing his legacy

Allmovie.title: Thor(2011)
Allmovie.description: Thor, the arrogant prince of Asgard, is banished to Earth by his father, Odin, after reigniting an ancient conflict. Stripped of his powers, he learns humility while forming a bond with scientist Jane Foster. Meanwhile, his deceitful brother Loki seizes the throne of Asgard. As danger looms, Thor regains his strength, returns to Asgard, and stops Loki’s plans. In the end, he sacrifices his chance to reunite with Jane to protect both realms, proving himself a true hero

Allmovie.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Allmovie.description: During World War II, Steve Rogers, a frail but determined man, is chosen for a secret experiment that transforms him into the super-soldier Captain America. Sent to battle Hydra, the Nazi science division led by the villainous Red Skull, Steve becomes a symbol of hope. With the help of Peggy Carter and Bucky Barnes, he takes down Hydra’s operations. In a heroic act, he crashes Red Skull’s superweapon into the Arctic to save millions, becoming frozen in ice for decades. Awakening in the modern world, Steve realizes his fight is far from over

Allmovie.title: Marvel’s The First Avengers (2012)
Allmovie.description: When Loki, the Norse god of mischief, steals the Tesseract and threatens Earth, Nick Fury assembles a team of superheroes—Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, and Hawkeye—to stop him. Despite initial conflicts, the heroes unite to battle Loki and his alien army in New York City. After an intense fight, the Avengers defeat Loki, and he is taken back to Asgard. With the world saved, the team goes their separate ways, but a new cosmic threat looms in the shadows

Allmovie.title: Ironman-3
Allmovie.description: After the Battle of New York, Tony Stark struggles with anxiety and obsessively builds new Iron Man suits. When a terrorist known as the Mandarin launches attacks, Tony’s world is shattered, and he is forced to rely on his intelligence to survive. He uncovers a conspiracy involving scientist Aldrich Killian, who has developed the dangerous Extremis virus. With the help of his ally James 'Rhodey'Rhodes and his own ingenuity, Tony defeats Killian. In the end, he destroys his suits, undergoes surgery to remove the arc reactor from his chest, and realizes that Iron Man is not just a suit—it’s the man inside

Allmovie.title: Thor-2
Allmovie.description: Thor battles to restore peace across the Nine Realms, but when the ancient Dark Elf Malekith resurfaces, seeking to use the powerful Aether to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must team up with his treacherous brother, Loki. After Malekith fatally wounds their mother, Thor and Loki join forces to stop him. Despite Loki’s apparent sacrifice, Thor defeats Malekith in a climactic battle. Returning to Asgard, Thor declines the throne, choosing instead to protect the realms as a warrior, unaware that Loki has secretly taken Odin’s place

Allmovie.title: Captain America-2
Allmovie.description: Steve Rogers, now working for S.H.I.E.L.D., struggles to adjust to the modern world. When Director Nick Fury is attacked and warns of a conspiracy within S.H.I.E.L.D., Captain America teams up with Black Widow and newcomer Sam Wilson (Falcon) to uncover the truth. They discover that Hydra has infiltrated S.H.I.E.L.D. and is using the Winter Soldier—a deadly assassin who is revealed to be Steve’s long-lost friend, Bucky Barnes. In a thrilling battle, Steve refuses to fight Bucky, hoping to bring him back. S.H.I.E.L.D. collapses, Hydra is exposed, and Bucky begins to regain his memories before disappearing

Allmovie.title: Guardians of the galaxy 1
Allmovie.description: Space adventurer Peter Quill, also known as Star-Lord, steals a mysterious orb, making him the target of the ruthless warlord Ronan the Accuser. While on the run, he forms an unlikely team with assassin Gamora, warrior Drax the Destroyer, tech-savvy raccoon Rocket, and the gentle but powerful tree-like creature Groot. When they discover the orb contains the Infinity Stone, capable of immense destruction, they unite to stop Ronan from using it to destroy planets. In an epic battle, they defeat Ronan with the power of friendship and music, becoming the Guardians of the Galaxy..

Allmovie.title: Avengers 2
Allmovie.description: The Avengers retrieve Loki’s scepter but accidentally create a powerful AI, Ultron, when Tony Stark and Bruce Banner attempt to build a global defense system. Ultron turns against humanity, planning to wipe it out using an artificial meteor. Along the way, the Avengers encounter the super-powered twins, Wanda and Pietro Maximoff, as well as the synthetic android Vision, created from the Mind Stone. In a climactic battle, the Avengers defeat Ultron, but Pietro sacrifices himself, and the city of Sokovia is destroyed. The film ends with new heroes—Vision, Scarlet Witch, Falcon, and War Machine—joining the Avengers, setting the stage for future conflicts.

Allmovie.title: Antman-1
Allmovie.description: Scott Lang, a skilled thief trying to turn his life around, is recruited by scientist Hank Pym to wear a powerful suit that allows him to shrink in size while increasing his strength. Trained by Hank and his daughter Hope van Dyne, Scott must stop Darren Cross, Hank’s former protégé, from mass-producing dangerous shrinking technology. With the help of his friends and his newfound abilities, Scott defeats Cross, who becomes the villainous Yellowjacket. In the end, he proves himself as a hero and hints at a new adventure involving the mysterious Quantum Realm.

Allmovie.title: Captainamerica-3
Allmovie.description: After a mission goes wrong, the government proposes the Sokovia Accords, which would place the Avengers under official oversight. This divides the team—Iron Man supports regulation, while Captain America opposes it, fearing loss of freedom. When Bucky Barnes (the Winter Soldier) is framed for a terrorist attack, Cap protects him, leading to a clash between the two factions. The conflict escalates when Zemo, the real mastermind, reveals that Bucky was brainwashed into killing Tony Stark’s parents. A brutal fight follows, leaving the Avengers fractured. Cap and his allies go into hiding, while Tony is left questioning everything, setting the stage for Avengers: Infinity War.

Allmovie.title: DoctorStrange
Allmovie.description: Dr. Stephen Strange, a brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon, loses the use of his hands in a car accident. Desperate for a cure, he travels to Kamar-Taj, where he learns the mystical arts from the Ancient One. As he masters sorcery, he discovers a dark plot by Kaecilius, a rogue sorcerer seeking to unleash Dormammu, a powerful cosmic entity. Using intelligence and time manipulation, Strange outsmarts Dormammu and forces him to leave Earth. Accepting his new role as the Sorcerer Supreme, he protects reality from mystical threats, setting up his future battles in the Marvel universe.

Allmovie.title: GotG-2
Allmovie.description: The Guardians—Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Baby Groot—are hired for a mission but soon find themselves pursued after Rocket steals valuable batteries. They are saved by Ego, who reveals himself as Peter Quill’s long-lost father. As Peter bonds with Ego, he learns the shocking truth: Ego is a celestial being who seeks to consume the universe, and he killed Peter’s mother. Meanwhile, Yondu, Nebula, and Mantis join the fight against Ego. In an emotional climax, Yondu sacrifices himself to save Peter, proving he was his true father figure. The Guardians grow closer as a family, setting up future adventures.

Allmovie.title: Spiderman-1
Allmovie.description: After his battle alongside the Avengers in Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker struggles to balance high school life with his superhero duties. Eager to prove himself to Tony Stark, he investigates illegal alien weapon sales linked to Adrian Toomes, aka the Vulture. When Peter discovers that Toomes is his crush Liz’s father, the stakes become personal. Defying Tony’s orders, he faces Vulture in a final battle and stops him from stealing advanced tech. Choosing responsibility over glory, Peter declines an offer to join the Avengers, proving he is more than just a 'friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.

Allmovie.title: Thor-3
Allmovie.description: Thor discovers that his long-lost sister, Hela, the Goddess of Death, has returned to claim Asgard’s throne. After being defeated, Thor is stranded on the planet Sakaar, where he is forced to fight in a gladiator arena against the Hulk, who has been missing since the events of Avengers: Age of Ultron. With the help of Loki, Valkyrie, and Hulk, Thor escapes and returns to Asgard. Realizing he cannot defeat Hela, he unleashes Ragnarok, destroying Asgard to stop her reign. The surviving Asgardians flee, but their ship is intercepted by Thanos, setting up the events of Avengers: Infinity War.

Allmovie.title: blackpanther 1
Allmovie.description: After the death of his father, T’Challa returns to Wakanda to take his rightful place as king and the Black Panther. His rule is challenged by Erik Killmonger, a ruthless warrior with a claim to the throne, who seeks to use Wakanda’s advanced technology to start a global revolution. Defeated and cast out, T’Challa regroups with his allies and returns to reclaim his kingdom. In a dramatic battle, he defeats Killmonger, who dies believing in his cause. Inspired by the events, T’Challa decides to share Wakanda’s knowledge with the world, opening a new chapter for his people.

Allmovie.title: Avengers 3
Allmovie.description: After Thanos wipes out half of all life with the Infinity Gauntlet, the remaining Avengers struggle with loss. Five years later, Ant-Man returns from the Quantum Realm with a plan to undo the snap. The Avengers embark on a daring Time Heist, traveling to the past to collect the Infinity Stones before Thanos can. They succeed, but 2014 Thanos follows them to the future, leading to a final epic battle. Iron Man sacrifices himself to defeat Thanos, restoring the universe. Captain America returns the Stones and chooses to live a full life in the past, passing his shield to Falcon

Allmovie.title: Antman 2
Allmovie.description: Scott Lang, under house arrest after the events of Captain America: Civil War, is recruited by Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym for a dangerous mission to rescue Janet van Dyne from the Quantum Realm. As they work on their quantum technology, they face threats from Ghost, a woman with unstable quantum powers, and black-market dealer Sonny Burch. With time running out, Scott and Hope (now the Wasp) fight to protect their mission. They successfully rescue Janet, who helps stabilize Ghost’s condition. In a mid-credits scene, Scott gets trapped in the Quantum Realm when Thanos' snap erases Hope, Hank, and Janet.

Allmovie.title: captainmarvel-1
Allmovie.description: Vers, a warrior of the Kree race, suffers from mysterious visions of a past she can’t remember. After crash-landing on Earth in the 1990s, she teams up with a young Nick Fury and discovers she was once Carol Danvers, a former Air Force pilot. She learns that the Kree have been manipulating her and that the Skrulls, their supposed enemies, are actually refugees seeking safety. Embracing her true identity, she unlocks her full powers and defeats the Kree forces. Carol then leaves Earth to help the Skrulls find a new home, while Fury begins laying the foundation for the Avengers Initiative.

Allmovie.title: Avenger-4
Allmovie.description: After the events of Avengers: Endgame, Peter Parker struggles with Tony Stark’s death and his responsibility as Spider-Man. During a school trip to Europe, Nick Fury recruits him to fight Elemental creatures alongside the mysterious new hero, Mysterio. However, Peter soon discovers that Mysterio is actually a fraud, using advanced illusions to manipulate the world. After a thrilling battle in London, Peter defeats Mysterio and reclaims control of Stark's powerful EDITH technology. In the shocking mid-credits scene, Mysterio exposes Peter’s identity to the world, setting up major consequences for his future..

Allmovie.title: spider-2
Allmovie.description: After the events of Avengers: Endgame, Peter Parker struggles with Tony Stark’s death and his responsibility as Spider-Man. During a school trip to Europe, Nick Fury recruits him to fight Elemental creatures alongside the mysterious new hero, Mysterio. However, Peter soon discovers that Mysterio is actually a fraud, using advanced illusions to manipulate the world. After a thrilling battle in London, Peter defeats Mysterio and reclaims control of Stark's powerful EDITH technology. In the shocking mid-credits scene, Mysterio exposes Peter’s identity to the world, setting up major consequences for his future..
